channel.title: Fixing an error on testscape
channel.description:
on my server testscape i compile it and it compiles without no errors then run it and it says
error occurred during initialization of vm java/lang/noclassdeffounderror: java/lang/object press any key to continue...
help is really appreciated fixing this dang error :D :D :D
edit:plz help! i have been wanting to fix this error for like 5 days now!

item.title: Fixing an error on testscape
item.dc:creator: @0wn3llz 0wn3llz
item.description:
@0wn3llz wrote:

Can you give me testscape lol?

Erm this might fix it edit your compile.bat to:

@echo off color f0 if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
